item.description:
It's time for dim sum again! You can also order off the menu. Good, cheap, eats and a fun time.

Here's a helpful dim sum primer written by fellow BBLDer Pam Phillips; http://home.comcast.n...

DRIVING DIRECTIONS: Check out Google to plan your driving route

PARKING: Call China Pearl at 617 426 4338 for advice, otherwise here are a few suggestions
Stanhope Garage 617 422 0504 * 78 Harrison Av (bet Kneeland St and Beach St) $22 (near China Pearl)
Super 88 Market lot 617 542 * 85 Essex St (bet Edinboro St and Ping On St) $10 (near China Pearl)
Central AllRight Parking lot 617 542 1529 * 17-23 West St $10 cash (bet China Pearl and Common and Opera House)
Boston Common Garage 617 954 2098 * 0 Charles St (bet Boylston St and Beacon St) $11 (near Opera House and Common)
Central AllRight Parking lot 617 542 1549 * 580 Washington St (bet Hayward St and Av de Lafayette) $10 cash (bet China Pearl and Common and Opera House)
FitzInn Parking lot 617 423 1518 * 658 Washington St. $???? (bet China Pearl and Common and Opera House)
Radisson (formerly Hyatt Regency) Hotel Parking Garage (Pilgrim Lafayette Garage) 617 357 1987 * 1 Av de Lafayette (bet Chauncy St and Washington St) $14 (bet China Pearl and Common and Opera House)

PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION: Create your own train &/or bus route here MBTA or Hop Stop

POST DINING ACTIVITY OPTIONS:
12:30 PM Take in the beauty and grandeur of Chinese New Year Spectacular at the Opera House Through the universal language of dance and music, Divine Performing Arts weaves wondrous stories of heavenly realms, enchanting dreams, ancient heroic legends and modern-day epics. With gorgeous pageantry, a dulcet and powerful full orchestra that brings eastern and western instruments together, and state-of-the-art backdrops, this production is a "can't miss." Performance runs 2.5 hours w/15 minute intermission Ticket price range $38 TO $120
OR
12:30 PM Ice Skating on the Frog Pond in the Boston Common COST: Admission $4 Rentals $8 Locker $1 GROUP LESSONS (include rental) are held from 9 AM UNTIL 10 AM on these four (4) subsequent Sundays; January 11th, 18th, 25th, and February 1st cost $90 Here's the Skating Lesson Details & Registration Form
OR
12:30 PM Burn off a few calories tossing a Frisbee on the Common. Play will be on or near the softball fields. Suggest dressing in layers and bring water. You're welcome to watch however if you plan to play you will need to sign up at the Ultimate Frisbee Meetup web site.

RULES of Engagement:
Please be considerate of your fellow diners time by arriving promptly.
Our focus is on friendly and respectful gatherings while sharing a delicious meal.
All RSVP's are on a first come, first served basis.
You may only RSVP YES or NO. Maybe isn't an option.
Please RSVP YES only if you are certain you will attend.
If you're not sure you can attend because you have other unconfirmed plans or uncertain transportation, please RSVP NO with a comment explaining your situation.
If brunch is full and you wish to attend, please select WAIT LIST RSVP. When a spot opens, your RSVP will automatically be changed to YES based on the time of your WAIT LIST RSVP. *If there is an overwhelming response, the reservation may be increased or another seating arranged.*
If your name appears on the event page as a YES after the event and you have not attended the event, it will count as a NO-SHOW for this event.
If I change you're RSVP to NO because you haven't replied by final update event confirmation email deadline, it will count as a NO-SHOW for this event.
If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO within twenty-four hours of the event, without an explanation, it will count as a NO-SHOW for this event.
If any guests you've RSVPd for NO-SHOW it will count as a NO-SHOW for this event.
If you are a NO-SHOW for THREE (3) events you are removed from the group.
NO-SHOWS impact everyone; from you, who could or has been on the wait list to the organizer as well as the restaurant's who staff based on our reservation.
If it is less than twenty-fours from the meal and you are not able to attend or are running late, you MUST call or text me at 617 445-7549.
An email from you explaining your absence is an expected courtesy.
If you are removed and there were extenuating circumstances, please email me about rejoining.
Your feedback is appreciated so, rate the event and venue by completing surveys afterward.
I will arrive at China Pearl by 10:15 AM to arrange seating as well as welcome you.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Tonya/Meetup reservation or call/text my cell (617) 445 7549

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: China Pearl Dim Sum - IT'S JAN 11th 9 AM.....I'LL BE THERE
